    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Card
    Representation of a playing card with a suit and rank - Ace (lowest) to King (highest)
    Card.CompareOn
    specifiers for which attributes of a Card should be used when comparing instances
    CardBase
    representation of any kind of playing card providing 'universal' functionality
    CardBase.EnabledDisabled
    enable/disable decoration
    CardColor
    An enumeration of colors of cards in a standard playing card deck.
    Deck
    Representation of a standard deck of cards containing 4 suits: Clubs, Diamonds, Hearts, Spades 13 ranks: Ace, 2..9, Jack, Queen, King 2 Jokers
    DiscardPile
    Representation of a discard pile
    DiscardPile
    Representation of a discard pile
    Hand
    Representation of a hand of cards
    Hand
    Representation of a hand of cards
    Meld
    represents a set of matching cards, typically three or more, that earn a player points and/or allow them to deplete their hand
    Meld
    represents a set of matching cards, typically three or more, that earn a player points and/or allow them to deplete their hand
    NoCardsException
    Runtime exception to wrap lower-level exceptions during testing - uses Exception chaining
    Orientation
    Represents the orientation of a Card (face up or face down).
    Orientation.Selector
    control toString()'s behavior wrt which field it will return
    Persistence
    Represents the persistence of a Card (permanent or temporary).
    Pile
    Representation of a pile of standard playing cards
    PileBase
    Representation of a pile of cards
    Player
    Representation of a player
    Player
    Representation of a player
    Rank
    An enumeration of card ranks.
    Stock
    Representation of a stock of cards
    Stock
    Representation of a stock of cards
    Suit
    An enumeration of card suits.
    TopThis
    NOTE This is a sample, fictitious card game
    ValidateEnvironment
    validate the project environment and name
    YourGame
    NOTE: You will modify this code
